resources.string: If the task is accessing location information until the permission is granted, it will end with an error. If you want to give permission, run \"location permission\" from the menu.

The authority required to read the location information in TaskAutomation. \nIf the task is accessing location information until the permission is granted, it will end with an error. \nDo you want to request a location permission?
The application cannot be started because you have not been granted permission to access the internal storage.
Grant permission to access internal storage to read and write data that is synchronized to internal storage and for administrative data.
